descriptions.1: The Overlord takes a bite out of the unit in the hex behind him, dealing {HPPercentDamage}% of their max Health as true damage. He gains {PercentHPGain}% of their Health and {PercentADGain}% of their Attack Damage.

traits.name: Virus

descriptions.1: The Virus infects your shop with a {ChanceToSee}% chance to spawn a bloblet. When purchased, it merges and increases the strongest Zac's max Health by {BonusPercentHPPerStack}% and Ability Power by {BonusAPPerStack} (doubled in Hyper Roll). (Total Bloblets: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT14_Virus_Stacks@)
